name: Generic Two Player Game
description:
G2P features four different modes to play against a friend:

  • COLLECT - collect ten gold tokens before your opponent does!
    • Rockets, Coin Pulse, Teleporters
  • SURVIVE - survive longer than your opponent with ten lives!
    • Scratch, Laser, Extra Lives
  • ZONE - spend fifteen seconds in the zone before your opponent!
    • Rockets, Gatling Guns, Teleporters
  • BREAK - survive longer than your opponent on the disappearing floor!
    • Breakers, Laser, Extra Lives

Each mode has toggleable settings (in italics above) that can be changed by using the left/right arrow keys or A/D on the menu screen. Hold escape to return to the menu at any time.
